    ExtremeStats.AbstractMaxima — Type.
    AbstractMaxima

    A collection of maxima (e.g. block maxima)

    ExtremeStats.BlockMaxima — Type.
    BlockMaxima(x, n)

    Maxima obtained by splitting the data x into blocks of size n.

    meanexcess(xs, k)

    Return mean excess of the data xs using previous k values.

    ExtremeStats.returnlevels — Function.
    returnlevels(xs)

    Return periods and levels of data xs.

    returnlevels(gev, mmin, mmax; nlevels=50)

    Return nlevels periods and levels of generalized extreme value distribution gev with maxima in the interval [mmin,mmax].
